short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download photos, videos and Reels from Instagram.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instagram Downloader for Instagram makes it easy to download any content from Instagram. Add the extension to your browser, and a download button will appear on every post, Reel, and Story.

Features:
- Download Anything: Click the download button on any post, Reel, or Story.
- Bulk Download: Use the "Download All" button on accounts to save all posts in one click.
- Hotkey: Use Ctrl + Shift + D or Cmd + Shift + D for quick downloads.
- Easy Organization: Downloads are organized into folders named after the Instagram account.
- Note: Reload Instagram tabs after installing or updating the extension.

Add to Chrome and start downloading!
